name: 烛梦灯 The Dreams of Candlelight
name_original: 烛梦灯 The Dreams of Candlelight
description:
The Dreams of Candlelight - Chinese style suspense decryption plot game

Introduction


In the late Qing Dynasty, early Republic of China.

Su Linfeng, who has just returned from studying abroad.
He was curious about his brother-in-law, so he looked for a family picture of her sister's marriage.
But found one more person in the photo ......
And who is that ...
Why do they appear in the family portrait?
Since my father loved her mother, why did she not mention her mother?
The death of his mother was a simple dystocia or ...?
Locked room ...
Hidden photos ...
Sixteen years ago ...
What happened?

--------------------------------------------------

Game Introduction



  • The total length of the game about 5-10 hours, a variety of outcomes reached
  • full-featured voice dubbing, allowing you to more realistic experience of emotional changes in the game
  • Multi-scene interactive decryption.
